description.content: Implemented Rapidly Exploring Random Tree (RRT) algorithm with 50% goal bias on the E-Puck robot in Webots.

description.content: Supervisor and Controller scripts in Python generated and replayed path trees for different propagation settings.
Simulated an Einzel lens to focus electron beams for a miniaturized MEMS-based Transmission Electron Microscope.

description.caption: Meshed Einzel lens structure in COMSOL

description.content: Beam quality metrics such as beta emittance and 1-RMS were analyzed to study lens performance.

Simulated thermal conduction and convection in lithium-ion pouch cells using Ansys Fluent and EChem tools.
Helped evaluate optimal cooling strategies for battery packs used in EV applications.
